chunk_id: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0__chunk_1044
source: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0
text:
thers should attend their local clinic three to six days after normal delivery, for check -up of themselves
and their babies.
• Essential elements of the woman’s check-up are as follows:
o any orders or special concerns noted on the discharge summary
o check temperature, heart rate, blood pressure, respiratory rate
o palpate the abdomen and uterus for tenderness
o examine the legs for evidence of thrombosis
o check for vaginal bleeding and offensive vaginal discharge
o check breasts and nipples
